title: Give Me Some Credit: EDA, XGBoost, LightGBM & SHAP
description: GIVE ME SOME CREDITThis notebook is created 9 years after this competition ended. The main aim of this project is to predict the probabily whether a customer will default in the future given his record present in the dataset. We will be using predict_proba to determine the delinquency probabilities of the customer. The Highlights of the notebook are:  Exploratory Data Analysis **Outlier Analysis **Null Handling **Distribution Analysis **Skewness Reduction (using Box Cox Transformation)   Feature Engineering LightGBM using RandomizedSearchCV (Classification) Evaluation Metrics Mean Squared Error Root Mean Squared Error Mean Absolute Error Mean Squared Logarithmic Error Root Mean Square Logarithmic Error Accuracy on Training Set Accuracy on Test Set F-Beta Score (Beta = 2) F1 Score Precision Recall Confusion Matrix AUC Curve   Probability Prediction on Validation Sets Delinquency Prediction on Validation Sets Feature Importances Summary Plot SHAP Analysis     XGBoost using RandomizedSearchCV (Classification) Evaluation Metrics Mean Squared Error Root Mean Squared Error Mean Absolute Error Mean Squared Logarithmic Error Root Mean Square Logarithmic Error Accuracy on Training Set Accuracy on Test Set F-Beta Score (Beta = 2) F1 Score Precision Recall Confusion Matrix AUC Curve   Probability Prediction on Validation Sets Delinquency Prediction on Validation Sets Feature Importances Summary Plot SHAP Analysis      Let's begin with importing the libraries we will be requiring for this notebook

GIVE ME SOME CREDITThis notebook is created 9 years after this competition ended.
The main aim of this project is to predict the probabily whether a customer will default in the future given his record present in the dataset.
We will be using predict_proba to determine the delinquency probabilities of the customer.
The Highlights of the notebook are:  Exploratory Data Analysis **Outlier Analysis **Null Handling **Distribution Analysis **Skewness Reduction (using Box Cox Transformation)   Feature Engineering LightGBM using RandomizedSearchCV (Classification) Evaluation Metrics Mean Squared Error Root Mean Squared Error Mean Absolute Error Mean Squared Logarithmic Error Root Mean Square Logarithmic Error Accuracy on Training Set Accuracy on Test Set F-Beta Score (Beta = 2) F1 Score Precision Recall Confusion Matrix AUC Curve   Probability Prediction on Validation Sets Delinquency Prediction on Validation Sets Feature Importances Summary Plot SHAP Analysis     XGBoost using RandomizedSearchCV (Classification) Evaluation Metrics Mean Squared Error Root Mean Squared Error Mean Absolute Error Mean Squared Logarithmic Error Root Mean Square Logarithmic Error Accuracy on Training Set Accuracy on Test Set F-Beta Score (Beta = 2) F1 Score Precision Recall Confusion Matrix AUC Curve   Probability Prediction on Validation Sets Delinquency Prediction on Validation Sets Feature Importances Summary Plot SHAP Analysis      Let's begin with importing the libraries we will be requiring for this notebook
